MPGSET \$b RACE Human MPGSET \$b LEVEL $%LEVEL(\$i)% MPGSET \$b REJUV 0 MPBEHAVE Decay \$b remain=99 notrigger MPFORCE \$b sayto \$i Greetings! I was hoping you might help me by proofreading my history paper. Well, not proofread so much as fill in gaps. Maybe 'finish' is a better word. Thanks! MPARGSET \$0 \$b MPFORCE \$b MPOLOAD GenPaper MPGSET \$b NAME a scholarly historical paper MPGSET \$b DISPLAY an important piece of paper has been left here. MPGSET \$b READABLETEXT The History of the Universe by Grothus Gallslanger.
